name: Axethrower: The Great Axe Tournament
blurb: Axethrower is a unique multiplayer game where you have to fight each other using a shared weapon.

rewards.reward:
CITIZENSHIP
============================
ADD YOUR (OR ANOTHER) NAME TO THE LORE
============================
The Cubiverse will feature a Kickstarter planet. A citizen with a name of your choosing will be added to the lore. You can pledge this multiple times for multiple names.

All rewards will include citizenship.

THE CUBIVERSE
============================
THE GAME + CITIZENSHIP
============================
DRM-free digital download of Axethrower or steam version if we're green lit.

FIRST PIONEER
============================
EARLY BIRD GAME + BACKER BONUSSES + EARLY ACCESS + PIONEER CREDIT
============================
You will receive the Pioneer tier rewards below, but because you were quick on your feet you’ll get it for less! Good thinking!

PIONEER
============================
THE GAME + BACKER BONUSSES + EARLY ACCESS + PIONEER CREDIT
============================ 
As a Pioneer of the Cubiverse you will receive a copy of Axethrower. You will also get access to the Kickstarter limited character, and will get a green star next to your name to show off your badassness for backing us! You will be credited as a ‘Pioneer’, and receive an automatic invite to participate in Backer Polls and development builds.

FIRST LEADER
============================ 
EARLY BIRD LEADER TIER 
============================ 
You will receive the Leader tier rewards below,
but because you were a fast follower of Axethrower you'll pay less. You are amazing!

LEADER
============================ 
PIONEER TIER + SOUNDTRACK + BACKER ONLY SKINSET  + DIGITAL LORE BOOK
============================
You’ll get everything in the pioneer tier, but you will get a double star next to your name. You will also receive the soundtrack on a digital download and you will get a special 'backer only' skin for every character in the game. This includes new characters that will come out later. You will be credited in the game as a ‘Leader’.

PIXELATED
============================ 
LEADER TIER + DESIGN A EXTRA CHARACTER SKIN!
============================ 
Next to being a total badass for having all the leader tier bonuses, you will work with our artist to design a new skin for one of the characters. You will be credited in the game as ‘Pixelated’ and for the character skin.

AXEFULLY PIXELATED
============================
ADD YOUR (OR ANOTHER) NAME TO THE LORE 
============================
You will get everything that’s included in the leader tier. You will be working with our artist to design a weapon that’s unique to one of the worlds in the Cubiverse. Your design will be credited and you will also be credited as one of the ‘Axefully Pixelated’.

CIVILIZED PIXELATED
============================
LEADER TIER + DESIGN A CHARACTER
============================
Your vision will give to life a hero of the Cubiverse. Players will be able to fight with the character you designed with the help of our artist. You will also receive the leader tier rewards,  be credited for the character and will be one of the ‘Civilized Pixelated’.

CUBIVERSAL EXPLORER
============================
LEADER TIER + DESIGN A WORLD
============================
You are an explorer and have sprung across a whole new Cubiverse world. Together with our team you will be the one who will define this world and help design the level, character and weapon for this world. You can play god (as long as it’s wacky enough). You will be credited for this in the game and the lore book, and will be credited as a ‘Cubiversal explorer’.

CUBIVERSAL INVENTOR
============================
LEADER TIER + DESIGN A GAME MODE
============================
You are one of the lucky few inventors that may work on the Axethrower Tournament rules, you are responsible for ‘safe’ yet engaging ways for players to butcher each other. You will work together with the development team to design a cruel new game mode. This will of course be documented in the lore and you will be credited as a ‘Cubiversal Inventor’ in the credits.

CUBIVERSAL HERO
============================
LEADER TIER + HERO REWARD
============================
Next to the leader tier rewards, you will work with our team to be immortalized in the Cubiverse lore. This will be included in the Cubiverse Lore book and your likeness will be put in the game. You will be referred to as a ‘Cubiversal Hero’ in the credits.

CUBIVERSAL LEGEND
============================
LEADER TIER + LEGEND REWARD
============================
You are a living legend of the Cubiverse. You will be immortalized as a champion for of the Cubiverse worlds. Your likeness will be a playable character in the game. You can choose if you want eternal dibs on the character or if you want others to play it as well. You will be referred as a ‘Cubiversal Legend’ in the credits.
